title: Ep. 78: Seek Out Silence
description:
Ep. 78: We talk about why you might want to seek out silence, why a happiness hack used by our parents worked so well, and why it's helpful to consider "Am I more pulled toward leisure or toward work?" Get in touch: @gretchenrubin; @elizabethcraft; podcast@gretchenrubin.com; happiercast.com/78; 774-277-9336. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
